descriptionHtml:
Calientes bodymesh
shiny and no shiny underwear
found by the blacksmith in solitude outside on the table
this is mererly a conversion from an oblivion mod lingeries.
orginal files is here
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/23589

update!
some shader issue fixed i hope, a body weightsliderfixed, whats left is the cloth itself so it works with body slider better,im sorry party updates comes like this but i will fix everything so please be patience, im up to the cloth issue now and then when all works i will add more color options

what did u do in the files?


i created new texture, an edited uv map, a few things is gone from the mesh

i create 0 to 1 bodyslide, works with weighslider almost!
well u can be either no weight or max weight, theres some issue in between but bare with me this is first time i attempted create a mod with weightslider =P

installation just drag files into datafolder


theru
author: theru
